attributes.action: Stop refusing children ADHD medication because of NHS funding costs
attributes.additional_details: Give the NHS more money to get medication for children suffering with ADHD
attributes.background: More money into NHS ADHD medication stop leaving children waiting for it telling parents that the government have no funding left to prescribe children they just have to wait and suffer until there is money available for medication

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700214

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700033
